name: Charon's Experimental Bundle
description:
A bundle of all my experimental little indie games that I made since 2005.

Included (roughly sorted by date of creation):

  • Creeps (prototype)
  • Omar in Space (prototype)
  • Dark Forest (online)
  • Dark Space (online)
  • Zkrembl (prototype)
  • Haunted (online/android)
  • CyberJones (prototype)
  • Daily Chthonicle (prototype)
